thread.title: Last Call for the Digital Publishing Innovation Summit 2015
thread.title_full: Last Call for the Digital Publishing Innovation Summit 2015

author: PRWEB
title: Last Call for the Digital Publishing Innovation Summit 2015
text:
This summit provides attendees with the tools to take their content further. New York City, NY
The Digital Publishing Innovation Summit is renowned for its seniority of both speakers & attendees, interactive content and dedicated networking opportunities. The summit boasts two days of quality keynote presentations, panel sessions and an Awards Ceremony.
This year’s summit has moved beyond traditional areas of digital publishing, evolving into a function that commands the attention of every digital business. Through great content, comes new customers and increasing customer retention.
“This summit provides attendees with the tools to take their content further,” explains Conference Organizer, Nathan Meyer. “It’s more than just dissemination as we look to increase our global audience, create new revenue streams and new opportunities.”
This year’s line-up includes: The Associated Press, Vanity Fair, The Huffington Post, Penguin, Playbuzz, Bloomberg, Playboy, Fusion, Taboola, Daily Mail & many more.
There are only a few passes remaining so attendees are urged to sign up this week to guarantee a place for next week’s summit. For a more complete list of speakers, presentations and registration details for the Digital Publishing Innovation Summit, New York, please visit: http://theinnovationenterprise.com/summits/digital-publishing-innovation-summit-new-york-2015
About Innovation Enterprise :
Innovation Enterprise, a CFO Publishing company is an independent business-to-business multi-channel media brand focused on the information needs of Senior Finance, Operations, Analytics, Big Data, Strategy, Digital, Innovation & Sports executives. Products include IE.Summits, ieOnDemand, ieWebinars, ieWhitepapers & more.
